import{createReducer}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={isLoading:true};export var sellerReducer=createReducer(initialState,{LoadSellerRequest:function LoadSellerRequest(state){state.isLoading=true;},LoadSellerSuccess:function LoadSellerSuccess(state,action){state.isSeller=true;state.isLoading=false;state.seller=action.payload;},LoadSellerFail:function LoadSellerFail(state,action){state.isLoading=false;state.error=action.payload;state.isSeller=false;},// get all sellers ---admin
getAllSellersRequest:function getAllSellersRequest(state){state.isLoading=true;},getAllSellersSuccess:function getAllSellersSuccess(state,action){state.isLoading=false;state.sellers=action.payload;},getAllSellerFailed:function getAllSellerFailed(state,action){state.isLoading=false;state.error=action.payload;},clearErrors:function clearErrors(state){state.error=null;}});// reducer -> logic (state change)
